title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
OB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user goes to Preferences > Workbench and selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification". The build menu option still appears in the Java popup menus. This behavior is incorrect.
EB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should be enabled only when "Perform build automatically on resource modification" is not selected in Preferences > Workbench.
SR:
To reproduce: 1. Go to Preferences > Workbench
2. Select "Perform build automatically on resource modification"
3. Open the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective
4. Verify that the "Build" action should not be enabled
